players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our ranks."

You: "I'm worried about the safety of our group now that one of us has been eliminated. Let's all make a promise to communicate openly and honestly with each other from now on, so we can work together to identify and root out any potential threats."
Diana: "I agree with Alice's suggestion for open and honest communication. Let us all work together to ensure the safety of our group and root out any potential threats."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
